weapons.name: Splattershot Jr.
weapons.description: Everyone's got to start somewhere. Good rate of fire and efficient ink use to boot. Not the most accurate of weapons, but it sprays ink so wildly you're bound to hit something!

weapons.name: Splattershot
weapons.description: Developed after the Great Turf War, this weapon is easy enough for anyone to use. A great all-arounder with few weak points. A trusty companion through think and thin.

weapons.name: Custom Splattershot Jr.
weapons.description: A new build of the Splattershot Jr., built by Sheldon after being inspired by some odd fluid he found stuck to the blueprints. Throw Disruptors at your opponents to slow them down.

weapons.name: Hero Charger Replica
weapons.description: A sweet replica created by Sheldon from his grandfather's blueprints. It looks funky fresh, to be sure, but apparently it's just a regular Splat Charger with a fancy paint job...

weapons.name: Hero Roller Replica
weapons.description: A sweet replica created by Sheldon from his grandfather’s blueprints. It looks funky fresh, to be sure, but apparently it’s just a regular Splat Roller with a fancy paint job...

weapons.name: Hero Shot Replica
weapons.description: A sweet replica created by Sheldon from his grandfather's blueprints. It looks funky fresh, to be sure, but apparently it's just a regular Splattershot with a fancy paint job...

weapons.name: Splat Charger
weapons.description: Charges up before releasing a concentrated, high-powered burst with excellent range. Charging takes a while, so be careful not to open yourself up to attack!

weapons.name: Splat Roller
weapons.description: A weapon adopted from an ordinary paint roller. Aside from inking the ground, it can also be swung to hurl globs of ink at your opponents.

weapons.name: Kelp Splat Charger
weapons.description: A Splat Charger modified by Sheldon using some seaweed that was stuck to the blueprints. Maybe the Sprinkler sub weapon is meant to keep the seaweed fresh?

weapons.name: Tentatek Splattershot
weapons.description: A slick Splattershot developed in collaboration with top gear brand Tentatek. With all-new options, the Tentatek Splattershot ensures you'll be ready for anything.

weapons.name: .52 Gal
weapons.description: A high-powered weapon that pumps out a lot of ink with each shot. It doesn't take many shots to splat an opponent, which is a good thing given its rather slow rate of fire.

weapons.name: N-ZAP '85
weapons.description: Each shot is kind of weak, but the high rate of fire makes up for it. This weapon's popularity is due not only to its helpful special but also to its snazzy futuristic design.

weapons.name: Slosher
weapons.description: A weapons-grade bucket that hurls ink straight ahead over an impressive range. By adjusting the angle, it can be used to hit opponents who are up high or even on the other side of a wall.

weapons.name: Classic Squiffer
weapons.description: A charger equipped with a miniaturized ink compression tank. The charge time is short, but it still packs a serious punch. The range leaves a little to be desired.

weapons.name: Heavy Splatling
weapons.description: Charge it up and let 'em have it with all six barrels! A maximum charge will unleash the full rapid-fire potential of this weapon.

weapons.name: Aerospray MG
weapons.description: Created by Sheldon from his grandfather’s blueprints. Extremely high rate of fire. Each shot is weak individually, but a sustained barrage can really pressure opponents.

weapons.name: Krak-On Splat Roller
weapons.description: Created in association with Krak-On, the freshest name in footwear. The sub weapon allows you to create a Super Jump point for your team, and the special lets you surge across the battlefield.

weapons.name: Splash-o-matic
weapons.description: One for the pros. Not outrageously powerful, but highly accurate. This weapon really comes into its own in the hands of someone with good aim.

weapons.name: Jet Squelcher
weapons.description: Designed to maximize range in order to effectively take on charger-type weapons. Boasts the greatest range of any automatic ink shooter.

weapons.name: N-ZAP '89
weapons.description: A follow-up to the N-ZAP '85, now with a sleek orange paint job. The sub and special have changed too, but its popularity remains as high as ever.

weapons.name: Inkbrush
weapons.description: A newly developed weapon with high mobility and a sturdy brush design. Its ink trail is narrow, but it paints the ground at incredible speed and delivers swift close-range attacks.

weapons.name: Mini Splatling
weapons.description: A lightweight and powerful Splatling cannon. A short charge time and rapid rate of fire deny the opponent any chance to catch their breath.

weapons.name: Blaster
weapons.description: Fires a special ink shot that explodes in mid-air. This explosion can be used to attack a wide area.

weapons.name: L-3 Nozzlenose
weapons.description: A semiautomatic weapon that fires three shots for every pull of the trigger. Keeping up a sustained barrage requires impeccable timing, but accuracy and range are good.

weapons.name: Neo Splash-o-matic
weapons.description: A Splash-o-matic with a different Sub and Special setup, enabling a different fighting style. Throw the opponent off balance with Burst Bombs and use the Inkzooka to pick off distant foes.

weapons.name: Tri-Slosher
weapons.description: This bucket's three sections originally held cleaning products but now hold... the exact opposite. These segmented sections allow you to attack in three directions at once.

weapons.name: Heavy Splatling Deco
weapons.description: A rhinestone-encrusted Heavy Splatling. Flush out your opponents with the sub weapon, and then smash into them with the Kraken special!

weapons.name: Carbon Roller
weapons.description: A strong, lightweight roller made from carbon fibre. Superb mobility means it spreads ink and delivers attacks with unparalleled speed.

weapons.name: H-3 Nozzlenose
weapons.description: A Nozzlenose that packs even more of a punch. A long interval between shots is made up for by high attack power, which makes splatting your opponent in one go a real possibility.

weapons.name: Splattershot Pro
weapons.description: An updated Splattershot developed with advanced battlers in mind. Consumes a lot of ink and has a slow rate of fire, but its range and accuracy are vastly improved.

weapons.name: Slosher Deco
weapons.description: A decorated version of the Slosher. A sub weapon suited for head-on encounters coupled with a special designed for close-quarters combat makes for a fresh battling experience.

weapons.name: .52 Gal Deco
weapons.description: A bedazzled .52 Gal shooter. Your opponents may laugh at you...until you run them down with Seekers and the almighty Inkstrike.

weapons.name: New Squiffer
weapons.description: Sheldon has used the blueprints to adjust the sub and special setup. Trap your opponents in a sticky situation with the sub, or deliver a long-range strike with the special.

weapons.name: Inkbrush Nouveau
weapons.description: An Inkbrush with a different sub and special setup. Fight on your own terms by using the sub to distract the opponent so you can get in close where this weapon shines.

weapons.name: Luna Blaster
weapons.description: A blaster tailored to close-quarters combat. It fires a shot that detonates powerfully at close range, and the Inkzooka special can help handle opponents who are farther away.

weapons.name: Hydra Splatling
weapons.description: A fire hydrant that's been converted into a powerful long-range Splatling cannon. It's slow to charge, but the long period of sustained fire makes up for it.

weapons.name: .96 Gal
weapons.description: Similar to the .52 Gal, but with an improved mechanism and a more stable shot. Range and power have been increased...at the cost of being even more ink hungry.

weapons.name: Octobrush
weapons.description: A heavier brush with fatter bristles. Uses a lot of ink but offers a wider ink trail and excellent mobility. Can be swung to fling large globs of ink.

weapons.name: Sploosh-o-matic
weapons.description: The perfect weapon for getting up close and personal! High attack power and rate of fire, but its range is extremely limited.

weapons.name: Splatterscope
weapons.description: A Splat Charger fitted with a scope to allow for precision aiming. The range has been increased, but the field of vision is rather narrow.

weapons.name: Sloshing Machine
weapons.description: A compact washing machine that's been adapted for battle. The spinning action means that the area around the ink glob also gets a dose of ink.

weapons.name: Aerospray RG
weapons.description: This weapon performs similarly to the Aerospray MG, but the loadout comes with Ink Mine instead of the Seeker. This loadout is more effective in Splat Zones than Turf War. Consider using the Ink Recovery Up ability to replenish ink faster after dropping an Ink Mine near an objective or chokepoint.

weapons.name: L-3 Nozzlenose D
weapons.description: A specially designed L-3 Nozzlenose with a logo on it. The sub weapon lets you finish off opponents who are still standing, and the special allows you to strike from up close.

weapons.name: Carbon Roller Deco
weapons.description: A snazzier version of the Carbon Roller. The Seeker sub weapon not only attacks the opponent but draws a path right to them. The special lets you send out a swarm of Seekers.

weapons.name: Zink Mini Splatling
weapons.description: A specially designed Mini Splatling brought to you by leading sports brand Zink. The sub and special weapons shore up your ability in a firefight.

weapons.name: .96 Gal Deco
weapons.description: A bedazzled .96 Gal shooter. Splat your opponents through the included Splash Wall, or engage them up close and personal with the Kraken. Versatility is the name of the game.

weapons.name: Rapid Blaster
weapons.description: Mitigates the weaknesses of the regular Blaster by giving up a little shot power for a better rate of fire.

weapons.name: Range Blaster
weapons.description: A modified Blaster with a shot that travels farther before exploding. The ability to attack opponents who are farther away comes at the cost of short-range power.

weapons.name: H-3 Nozzlenose D
weapons.description: An H-3 Nozzlenose emblazoned with maker's logo. The Point Sensor and Inkzooka make for a completely different battling experience than that of the regular H-3.

weapons.name: Custom Jet Squelcher
weapons.description: A custom Jet Squelcher. The sub weapon lets you corner your opponents, and the quirky special weapon makes for a tricky package.

weapons.name: Dynamo Roller
weapons.description: Using the blueprints as a starting point, Sheldon has rigged up a motor to the roller base. Cumbersome to use, but delivers a powerful burst of ink when swung.

weapons.name: Bamboozler 14 Mk I
weapons.description: A reissue of a weapon used during the Great Turf War. It charges up extremely quickly and boasts great range even when not fully charged. Unfortunately, it is rather weak.

weapons.name: Luna Blaster Neo
weapons.description: A remodeled Luna Blaster. Use the Splat Bombs to control the distance between you and the enemy, forcing them closer or driving them away.

weapons.name: Tri-Slosher Nouveau
weapons.description: A Tri-Slosher with a rejigged Sub and Special setup. The Sub lets you get into optimum range and the Special allows you to track your opponents wherever they might be hiding.

weapons.name: Dual Squelcher
weapons.description: A double-barreled Jet Squelcher with a much higher rate of fire. The power of each shot is low, but the ample range and firing rate make up for it.

weapons.name: Rapid Blaster Pro
weapons.description: The Rapid Blaster Pro is based on the Rapid Blaster, but it's further specialized for increased range. Follow your Seekers to zip into an advantageous position and strike from your opponent's blind spot! The Inkzooka makes this a great set for frontline fighters who like to cause big problems for their foes!

weapons.name: Custom Blaster
weapons.description: This powerful weapon can splat opponents with one direct hit. The Bubbler special makes the weapon’s one-hit-kill capability even more dangerous for your opponents. Equip the Special Charge Up, Special Duration Up, and Special Saver abilities to utilize Bubbler with greater frequency and for longer durations.

weapons.name: Kelp Splatterscope
weapons.description: A Splatterscope Sheldon modified in the same way as the Kelp Splat Charger—by sticking seaweed to it. Naturally, it also has a Sprinkler.

weapons.name: Custom Range Blaster
weapons.description: A custom Range Blaster combined with a versatile sub weapon and a special weapon that excels in close-quarters combat.

weapons.name: Bamboozler 14 Mk II
weapons.description: A variant of the Bamboozler 14 Mk I. The sub weapon hampers your opponent's movement, giving you plenty of time to bring them down with a barrage of shots.

weapons.name: E-liter 3K
weapons.description: A charger with a high-capacity tank. By packing a lot of ink into each shot, it can strike from a great distance at the cost of long charge time and ferocious ink consumption.

weapons.name: Custom Dual Squelcher
weapons.description: A very special Dual Squelcher. The teammate-deploying Squid Beakon and cover-penetrating Killer Wail ensure you'll be a contributing factor.

weapons.name: Neo Splash-o-matic
weapons.description: A Sploosh-o-matic with a modified setup. Use the Point Sensor to sneak up behind the opponent's position, and then unleash this weapon's close-quarters attack power.

weapons.name: Rapid Blaster Deco
weapons.description: A decorated version of the Rapid Blaster. Its sub weapon can scatter opponents, and its special lets you maximize that potential. A great set for staving off aggressive foes.

weapons.name: Custom E-liter 3K
weapons.description: A special version of the E-Liter 3K that enables new strategies using the Squid Beakon and the powerful Kraken.

weapons.name: E-liter 3K Scope
weapons.description: An E-Liter 3K fitted with a scope. It isn't just easier to target opponents from a distance - the E-Liter 3K Scope boasts the greatest range of any weapon.

weapons.name: Forge Splattershot Pro
weapons.description: A Splattershot Pro created in partnership with Forge, the only name in high-quality sports gear. A tricky Point Sensor sub weapon supports the reliable main weapon.

weapons.name: Gold Dynamo Roller
weapons.description: A Dynamo Roller with rearranged sub and special weapons. Lure the enemy out of hiding with the sub weapon, and then unleash the full force of your powerful roller.

weapons.name: Custom E-liter 3K Scope
weapons.description: A Custom E-liter 3K with a scope. The range and zoom is impressive, but the viewfinder is so narrow that it's easy to leave yourself open to attack while aiming.

weapons.name: Rapid Blaster Pro Deco
weapons.description: A decorated model of the Rapid Blaster Pro. Its effectiveness can be increased through clever use of the sub weapon to slow down your opponents enough to blast them.

weapons.name: Octoshot Replica
weapons.description: A replica of the Octoling’s go-to weapon. Happens to function like a Tentatek.
